original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘gorūpassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena go rūpassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, gorūpo sakaṁ gehaṁ na vijahati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja go rūpaḥ sakam geham na vijahati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sako kāyo na vijahitabbo ‘aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṁsanadhammo ayaṁ kāyo’ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sakaḥ kāyaḥ na vijahitabbaḥ anicca chādana parimaddana bhedana vikiraṇa viddhasana dhammaḥ ayam kāya iti

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpo ādinnadhuro sukhadukkhena dhuraṁ vahati;

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ādinnabrahmacariyena sukhadukkhena yāva jīvitapariyādānā āpāṇakoṭikaṁ brahmacariyaṁ caritabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena ādinna brahmacariyena sukha dukkhena yāva jīvita pariyādānā āpāṇakoṭikam brahmacariyam caritabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpo chandena ghāyamāno pānīyaṁ pivati;

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācariyupajjhāyānaṁ anusiṭṭhi chandena pemena pasādena ghāyamānena paṭiggahetabbā.

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpo yena kenaci vāhiyamāno vahati;

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena theranavamajjhimabhikkhūnampi gihiupāsakassāpi ovādānusāsanī sirasā sampaṭicchitabbā.

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
